summary: The young Norse god Thor embarks on a quest with his brother Loki to find and recover a legendary sword.
cast: Matthew Wolf|Rick Gomez|Tara Strong|Alistair Abell|Paul Dobson|Brent Chapman|Chris Britton|Ron Halder|Cathy Weseluck|Michael Dobson|John Novak|Mark Acheson|Ashleigh Ball|Brian Drummond|Mark Gibbon|Jillian Michaels|Ty Olsson|Venus Terzo
title: Thor: Tales of Asgard
